title: About me
description: Hi! As you can see, I'm a collage artist, currently based at Madrid. I love to play with colors, shapes, and textures, and I'm always looking for new ways to express myself through this medium. I hope you enjoy my work! For inquiries and custom orders, paulasanchezmayor@gmail.com

title: Hopperiana
description: Collages inspired by / using the works of Edward Hopper.

title: Otros mundos
description: Collages inspired by surreal, sci-fi, or fantastic landscapes.

title: Femininity
description: Playing with female bodies, shapes, and colors.
